overview: The psychotherapist, Mark Minaev, is studying a strange case in his practice. His patient Mikhail Anipkin, a video cameraman by profession, suffers from schizophrenia. The disease gives rise to rare branches. The so-called conversion disorder. The psyche gives the body a signal to play its games. In this case, the patient claims that there was an atomic war, and he took refuge in a bunker...
title: Last First Day
